description:
Disney releases an official synopsis from Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales, and confirms Orlando Bloom.迪斯尼影片公司公开了电影《加勒比海盗5：死无对证》的官方剧情简介，奥兰多·布鲁姆确认出演。

Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales had been filming in Australia for most of the year. Johnny Depp is leading the cast, back in his once Oscar-nominated role as Captain Jack Sparrow. Furthermore, Brenton Thwaites, Javier Bardem, Kaya Scodelario, Geoffrey Rush, Kevin McNally and Stephen Graham are all on board the new film.《加勒比海盗5：死无对证》会在今年大半年里都取景澳洲拍摄，饰演杰克·斯派罗船长而获奥斯卡提名的约翰尼·德普将在新电影中携布兰顿·思怀兹、哈维尔·巴登、卡雅·斯考达里奥、杰弗里·拉什、凯文·麦克纳利以及史蒂芬·格拉汉姆众明星领衔出演。

The movie has been directed by Joachim Ronning and Espen Sandberg. And over the weekend, a rumour about a further returning cast member was confirmed. For Orlando Bloom is back, reprising his role of Will Turner in the new movie.此部影片的导演是乔阿吉姆·罗恩尼和艾斯彭·山德伯格。而上周末关于一名前剧组成员将要回归的传言也得以证实。奥兰多·布鲁姆将在系列新片中再次饰演威尔·特纳一角。

Little more is known than that so far, save for this official synopsis...截止目前，除如下官方剧情之外，关于此片的其他消息我们不得而知。

Thrust into an all-new adventure, a down-on-his-luck Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) finds the winds of ill-fortune blowing even more strongly when deadly ghost pirates led by his old nemesis, the terrifying Captain Salazar (Javier Bardem), escape from the Devil’s Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea…including him. Captain Jack’s only hope of survival lies in seeking out the legendary Trident of Poseidon, a powerful artifact that bestows upon its possessor total control over the seas.约翰尼·德普饰演的船长杰克·斯派罗踏上一场全新的冒险征程。他却不怎么走运。更糟糕的是，他的强敌——令人闻之色变的萨拉查船长（哈维尔·巴登饰演）逃离魔鬼三角，率领一大批幽灵海盗誓要将海上的海盗杀个精光，其中也包括杰克船长。而杰克船长的胜算全落海神波赛冬的三叉神戟上。它法力强大，传说中能赐予其拥有者掌控海洋之力。

Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales is set for release on July 7th 2017.电影《加勒比海盗5：死无对证》定于2017年7月7日上映。

title: 《加勒比海盗5：死无对证》奥兰多强势回归
